CustomField.description: This field will be tracked in Grid Buddy app(Req::418)
CustomField.formula:
IF( OR( AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName ,'Completed'), ISBLANK(Days_until_Closing__c) ), ISPICKVAL( Sales_Outcome__c,'Cancelled by Customer'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Lost to Competitor'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Withdrawn by Nokia'), ISPICKVAL(Sales_Outcome__c,'Obsolete'), ISPICKVAL(Apttus_Approval__Approval_Status__c , 'Pending Approval')
), 1,0 )
CustomField.label: Grid Buddy Closed
